name: Stealther
description:
Description

In this game, you don't fight your enemies, but you need to avoid them to get to the next level alive.

Enter the teleporter to progress through the game. 

You can collect coins you find on your way to increases your score!
There are 11 in total!

Controls: 

Movement:
You can use either WASD/Arrow-keys on your Keyboard...
...or you can use a controller and move with the left joystick/D-Pad

Restart: 
If you die, you can press "R" or "Select" on your controller to try again!

Exit game: 
When you've completed the game, use the "Escape" key to exit!
